description: API constructed with null scheduler causing TypeError on slow init
impact: Extension activation crash on some machines
notes: guarded command handlers and deferred event wiring
lastUpdated: Fix landed in v1.0.6; verify in CI with slow-init smoke tests

description: Async storage initialization changed from sync to async; integration tests assume sync behavior
impact: Integration tests failing; possible user-facing timing issues
mitigation: Made extension activation explicitly async with proper await patterns; storage.whenReady() called before component initialization
notes: Activation now properly awaits storage initialization; race conditions eliminated

description: Packaging/VSIX failed in agent/CI environment; publishing may be blocked
impact: Unable to produce VSIX in some environments
mitigation: Add CI job that runs `npx vsce package` and captures environment; ensure vsce auth and node env are available
notes: Local packaging succeeded; CI publishing not yet automated

description: Fire-and-forget saveState() calls can lead to unhandled rejections or lost writes
impact: Data loss or inconsistent persisted state
mitigation: Added comprehensive retry logic with exponential backoff; atomic writes with temp files; rate-limited user notifications
notes: Enhanced with 3-retry pattern and atomic operations; proper void handling with error recovery

description: Overlapping auto-refresh setInterval produced concurrent updates and state races
impact: UI glitches or errors when update takes longer than interval
mitigation: Guarded refresh with running flag; switch to recursive setTimeout if needed

description: Timers (setTimeout) firing after dispose may access disposed resources
mitigation: Track timeout IDs and clear them on dispose; check all components for timers
notes: Partial fixes applied; audit remaining timeouts

description: VS Code API mocking fragile in Vitest causing import resolution and context issues
impact: Integration tests failing locally due to mock gaps
mitigation: Use @vscode/test-electron for integration tests and add small `ExtensionContext` test fixture for unit tests
notes: Created unit smoke tests; need fixture to mock globalStorageUri/globalState properly

description: Concurrent disk writes without a write queue can reorder data
mitigation: Added atomic write operations with temp files; retry logic reduces write conflicts; comprehensive error handling
notes: Atomic writes with temp files significantly reduce concurrent write issues; further serialization could be added if needed

description: Webview CSP or inline scripts could introduce vulnerabilities or be blocked by VS Code
column12: All webviews use bundled scripts; verify CSP in webview manifests

description: Activation timing differences across OS/VS Code versions may not surface locally
impact: Users on different machines see activation errors or delayed features
mitigation: Add CI smoke tests that install VSIX in fresh profiles and run commands; publish after verification
notes: Planned; local install of VSIX succeeded (v1.0.6)

description: Enhanced error handling may show more user notifications than before
impact: Users may see more error dialogs if storage issues occur frequently
mitigation: Rate-limited notifications (5min intervals) with actionable Show Logs option
notes: Notifications provide better user feedback but frequency should be monitored in real usage
